data.title: Radio 4 Extra
data.meta_description: View the daily broadcast schedule for Radio 4 Extra. Find out what's on now and what's up next, or see schedules up to 7 days ahead.
data.text:
Charles Parker Prize

2024

Sara Parker meets the finalists of the annual prize for the best student audio feature.

Dixon of Dock Green

Series 2

PC Dixon probes one-time bad boy Geoff. Is he back to his old ways?

Whodunnits

Agatha Christie - Towards Zero

Lady Tresselian lets her ward bring his wife and ex-wife to her party sparking tensions...

Anything Legal

Episode 5

Charles and George hire a secretary to boost their new business.

Stop Messing About!

Series 2

Changing the lodger, and is marriage all wedded bliss?

North by Northamptonshire

Series 1

As a town prepares for its talent night, Mary gets a shock and Jonathan gets side-tracked.

EM Forster - Where Angels Fear to Tread

6. Captivated

As Harriet and Philip arrive to rescue Lilia's son, Philip becomes captivated by Italy.

Street and Lane

Series 1

Two Yorkshire builders tool up for a warring couple.

Stewart Love - Here Be Dragons

A dedicated teacher is made redundant and must deal with his onwards life.

Dixon of Dock Green

Series 2

When a charity box is filled with dud coins, PC Dixon goes after the forger.

Whodunnits

Greywing

When dead fish are washed up on the beach, suspicion falls on a chemical plant.

As Parliament returns from recess, young political editor Sam Peakes needs a story - fast.

2. Draco

Having rescued the beautiful Contessa, 007 gains an unlikely ally.
